name: filecompressu

scripts.make-dist: npm run build && npm run dist
scripts.build:
npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:ts-files && echo '
Contents of ../dist after tsc:' && ls -R ../dist && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:files && npm run copy:utils && npm run copy:configs && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:package && npm run verify-build
scripts.build:run: npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.dist: npm run build && cd .. && npm run dist
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build && cd .. && npm run dist
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && cd .. && npm run dist

description: A modern file compression application for images, PDFs, and text files
